column.remarks: The ID uniquely identifying the code category the code is associated with

column.remarks: The name of the code

column.remarks: The value for the code

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name giving the type of entity associated with the generated ID

column.name: current
column.remarks: The current ID for the type

column.name: id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the error report

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The ID uniquely identifying the application that generated the error report

column.name: application_version
column.remarks: The version of the application that generated the error report

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description of the error

column.name: detail
column.remarks: The error detail e.g. a stack trace

column.name: created
column.remarks: The date and time the error report was created

column.name: who
column.remarks: The optional username identifying the user associated with the error report

column.name: device_id
column.remarks: The optional Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the device the error report originated from

column.name: feedback
column.remarks: The optional feedback provided by the user for the error

column.name: data
column.remarks: The optional base-64 encoded data associated with the error report

column.name: id
column.remarks: The ID uniquely identifying the mail template

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the mail template

column.name: content_type
column.remarks: The content type for the mail template

column.remarks: The Apache FreeMarker template for the mail template

column.name: updated
column.remarks: The date and time the mail template was last updated

column.name: id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the message type

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the message type

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code identifying the message status

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the message status

column.name: id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the message

column.name: username
column.remarks: The username identifying the user associated with the message

column.name: device_id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the device the message originated from

column.name: type_id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the type of message

column.name: correlation_id
column.remarks: The optional Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) used to correlate the message

column.name: priority
column.remarks: The message priority

column.name: status
column.remarks: The message status e.g. Initialised, QueuedForSending, etc

column.name: created
column.remarks: The date and time the message was created

column.name: data_hash
column.remarks: The hash of the unencrypted data for the message if the message is encrypted

column.name: encryption_iv
column.remarks: The base-64 encoded initialisation vector for the encryption scheme for the message

column.name: send_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times that the sending of the message was attempted

column.name: process_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times that the processing of the message was attempted

column.name: download_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times that an attempt was made to download the message

column.name: lock_name
column.remarks: The name of the entity that has locked the message for processing

column.name: last_processed
column.remarks: The date and time the last attempt was made to process the message

column.name: data
column.remarks: The data for the message

column.name: id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the message part

column.name: part_no
column.remarks: The number of the message part in the set of message parts for the original message

column.name: total_parts
column.remarks: The total number of parts in the set of message parts for the original message

column.name: send_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times that the sending of the message part was attempted

column.name: download_attempts
column.remarks: The number of times that an attempt was made to download the message part

column.name: status
column.remarks: The message part status e.g. Initialised, QueuedForSending, etc

column.name: message_id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the original message

column.name: message_username
column.remarks: The username identifying the user associated with the original message

column.name: message_device_id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the device the original message originated from

column.name: message_type_id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) uniquely identifying the type of the original message

column.name: message_correlation_id
column.remarks: The optional Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) used to correlate the original message

column.name: message_priority
column.remarks: The priority for the original message

column.name: message_created
column.remarks: The date and time the original message was created

column.name: message_data_hash
column.remarks: The hash of the unencrypted data for the original message if the message was encrypted

column.name: message_encryption_iv
column.remarks: The base-64 encoded initialisation vector for the encryption scheme for the original message

column.name: message_checksum
column.remarks: The checksum for the original message

column.name: lock_name
column.remarks: The name of the entity that has locked the message part for processing

column.remarks: The data for the message part
